resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77305</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77305</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aec-c74c-4082-2d88-b215ae0f51d2#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Díszlánc..</string>
            <string language="en">Finery chain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prachtkette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaîne de parure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente do finery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Catena del finery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλυσίδα στολιδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encadenamiento del finery</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">díszlánc, munkaeszközök ábrázolásával, füstkvarc gömbbel.</string>
            <string language="en">Finery chain representing set of tools, with smoky quartz orb</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  díszlánc,  Szilágysomlyó,  aranylánc,  római,  füsttopáz (füstkvarc),  oroszlánok,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, finery chain, szilágysomlyó, golden chain, Roman, smoky quartz, lions</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prachtkette, die Set Hilfsmittel, mit rauchiger 
Quarzkugel darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaîne de parure représentant l'ensemble 
d'outils, avec le corps rond fumeux de quartz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente do finery que representa o jogo das 
ferramentas, com o orb smoky de quartzo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Catena del finery che rappresenta insieme degli 
strumenti, con il orb fumoso del quarzo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλυσίδα στολιδιών που αντιπροσωπεύει το σύνολο 
εργαλείων, με τον καπνώή σφαίρα χαλαζία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encadenamiento del finery que representa el 
conjunto de herramientas, con el orbe ahumado del cuarzo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, Prachtkette, szilágysomlyó, 
goldene Kette, römischer, rauchiger Quarz, Löwen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, chaîne de parure, szilágysomlyó,
chaîne d'or, quartz romain et fumeux, lions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, corrente do finery, szilágysomlyó,
corrente dourada, quartzo roman, smoky, leões</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, catena del finery, szilágysomlyó, 
catena dorata, quarzo romano e fumoso, leoni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, αλυσίδα στολιδιών, szilαgysomlyσ, 
χρυσή αλυσίδα, ρωμαϊκός, καπνώδης χαλαζίας, λιοντάρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, encadenamiento del finery, 
szilágysomlyó, encadenamiento de oro, cuarzo romano, ahumado, 
leones</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77305</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40cf0aec-c74c-4082-2d88-b215ae0f51d2&v=1&b=3</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
